summary: Test suite for the dictization utilities that transform CKAN model objects (such as groups, packages, resources, users, tags, vocabularies) into plain dictionaries, covering a wide range of scenarios including permission checks, duplicate removal, mutable column stripping, handling of missing or deleted identifiers, private datasets, hierarchical group structures, extra metadata fields, and schema validation.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the dictization layer so that CKAN can reliably generate APIâ€‘ready dictionary representations of its core entities, ensuring data integrity, proper access control, and compliance with schema rules.
